import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import {FontAwesomeIcon} from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import {faBars} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import {ReactComponent as Cart} from './cart.svg' const Header = () => { const [hidden, setHidden] = useState(true) return (
Your Logo
SHOP SIGN IN
setHidden(!hidden)}>
SHOP SIGN IN
) } export default Header;
